#summary Using the SHARE command-line client.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Quick start =

Download the [http://code.google.com/p/sadi/downloads/detail?name=SHARE-client-0.1.jar SHARE command-line client].

Execute as follows:
{{{
$ java -Xmx1024m -jar SHARE-client-0.1.jar </path/to/query.sparql
}}}
